column2: Just Energy Group, Inc. engages in the provision of electricity and natural gas commodities, energy efficient solutions, and renewable energy options. The company is headquartered in Mississauga, Ontario and currently employs 1,581 full-time employees. The firm's segments include Consumer Energy and Commercial Energy. The firm operates in the United States, Canada and the United Kingdom, offering a range of energy products, including long-term fixed-price, variable rate and flat bill programs; home energy management services, including smart thermostats and tools to manage energy use at the appliance level, and residential solar panel installations. The company markets under the brands, such as Amigo Energy, GreenStar Energy, Just Solar, Tara Energy and TerraPass.
